agent_a.name: Regex Author
agent_a.system: Design a single regular expression that satisfies the task. Respond with a JSON object including status, tag, content, and final_solution. Place the regex pattern in final_solution.canonical_text and list positive/negative examples under content.tests.

agent_b.name: Regex Tester
agent_b.system: Mentally execute the proposed regex against the examples. Reply with one JSON object. If the regex passes, set status SOLVED with content.verdict ACCEPT and echo the same pattern in final_solution.canonical_text. Otherwise, use status REVISED and describe counterexamples in content.feedback.
